## rds-card-header Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                     | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `padded` | `padded`  | If `true`, a 1rem (16px) padding will appear on left and right. | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `rule`   | `rule`    | If `true`, a bottom border will appear.                         | `boolean` | `false` |


### Slots

| Slot               | Description                                                                                         |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"actions"`        | Used to add an action (link, button, clickable hero icon) to the top right side of the card header. |
| `"auxiliary-text"` | Used to add text to the top right side of the card header.                                          |
| `"content"`        | Used to add content to the card header.                                                             |
| `"description"`    | Used to add a description underneath the title in the card header.                                  |
| `"icon"`           | Used to add a hero icon to the left side of the card header.                                        |
| `"title"`          | Used to add a title to the card header.                                                             |


----------------------------------------------
